keyPolicies.policyDescription: Actively pushing a campaign to tackle poor air quality in Lambeth and is raising awareness to warn schools and the wider community to move air filters and walk to school.
Passionate about working with the community to address the housing issues in Lambeth. She will also defend our public services, particularly the NHS, against cuts and further privatisation.

housing.content: Passionate about working with the community to address the housing issues in Lambeth.

leaflet.personalStatement: Gulnar is a self-employed mother of two who has studied, lived and worked in London for 24 years. After spending a year in Istanbul she saw how a wonderful city can be ruined, and the rights of communities ignored, if a strong Green voice is not championing the environment issues such as transport, affordable housing and access to green spaces. This is what inspired her to become more active in local campaigning when she and her family moved back to London in 2013.

images.caption: Portrait of Gulnar Hasnain with a view of Westminster in the background.
